archimate:Requirement.name: SC.2.2.3a: a) using identity and access management solutions by leveraging an existing on-premises IAM solution, deploying an identity as a service (IDaaS) product and/or using a hybrid IAM solution
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
